bannerData.text: Opt for additional covers in the next steps to enhance your car protection

props.cueText: IDV is the maximum amount ACKO will pay you if your car is stolen or damaged beyond repair

props.text: For your ${#proposal.vehicle.vehicle_age}-year-old ${#proposal.vehicle.make_name} ${#proposal.vehicle.model_name}, we advise selecting an IDV of ${#plans.recommended_idv_display_value} lakh or more for maximum protection

props.cueText: IDV is the maximum amount ACKO will pay you if your car is stolen or damaged beyond repair

props.text: For your ${#proposal.vehicle.vehicle_age}-year-old ${#proposal.vehicle.make_name} ${#proposal.vehicle.model_name}, we advise selecting an IDV of ${#plans.recommended_idv_display_value} lakh or more for maximum protection

ncbMax.title: Maximum NCB unlocked!
ncbMax.ncbContent: You've earned the maximum No Claim Bonus (NCB) of ${#proposal.policy_attributes.ncb}%. We’ve applied the discount to your premium.

ncbProtect.title: Smart choice last year!
ncbProtect.ncbContent: As you bought No Claim Bonus (NCB) Protect add-on with your policy last year, your NCB hasn't reset to zero even though you claimed. We will apply ${#proposal.policy_attributes.ncb}% NCB discount on your renewal premium.

ncbIncrease.title: Here's your reward for staying claim-free
ncbIncrease.ncbContent: We've applied a ${#proposal.policy_attributes.ncb}% discount to your new plan since your NCB has increased from ${#proposal.vehicle.previous_policy.previous_ncb}% to ${#proposal.policy_attributes.ncb}%

ncbResetPolicyExpired.title: About your No Claim Bonus (NCB)
ncbResetPolicyExpired.ncbContent: Since it's been 90 days that your policy expired, your No Claim Bonus (NCB) has reset to ${#proposal.policy_attributes.ncb}%. This is not just ACKO's policy; all insurers offer ${#proposal.policy_attributes.ncb}% NCB if a policy is renewed 90 days after policy expiry.

ncbResetPreviousPolicyClaim.title: About your No Claim Bonus (NCB)
ncbResetPreviousPolicyClaim.ncbContent: Since you claimed at least once in your last policy, your No Claim Bonus (NCB) has reset to ${#proposal.policy_attributes.ncb}%. This is not just ACKO's policy; all insurers offer ${#proposal.policy_attributes.ncb}% NCB in the year following a claim.
